info.name: BIG-IP Next Access - BIG-IP Next CM Demo - 20.3-CM APIs-Public

item.name: BIG-IP Next Workflows - with Central Manager

body.raw:
{
  "name": "{{app_name}}",
  "set_name": "Examples",
  "template_name": "http",
  "description": "{{app_name}}-description",
  "parameters": {
    "application_name": "{{app_name}}",
    "application_description": "{{app_name}}-description",
    "enable_Global_Resiliency": false,
    "monitors": [
      {
        "interval": 5,
        "isDefault": true,
        "isHttpMonitor": true,
        "monitorName": "http",
        "monitorType": "http",
        "receiveString": ".*",
        "sendString": "GET / HTTP/1.0\\r\\n\\r\\n",
        "timeout": 16
      }
    ],
    "pools": [
      {
        "loadBalancingMode": "round-robin",
        "loadBalancingRatio": 10,
        "monitorType": [
          "http"
        ],
        "servicePort": 80,
        "application_name": "{{app_name}}",
        "poolName": "pool_{{app_name}}"
      }
    ],
    "virtuals": [
      {
        "FastL4_idleTimeout": 600,
        "FastL4_looseClose": true,
        "FastL4_looseInitialization": true,
        "FastL4_resetOnTimeout": true,
        "FastL4_tcpCloseTimeout": 43200,
        "FastL4_tcpHandshakeTimeout": 43200,
        "TCP_idle_timeout": 60,
        "UDP_idle_timeout": 60,
		"is_virtual_type_standard": true,
		"auto_last_hop": "auto",
		"enable_Access": true,
		"accessPolicyEnum": "{{psp_policy_name}}",
        "accessAdditionalConfigurations": " ",
        "enable_FastL4": false,
        "enable_HTTP2_Profile": false,
        "enable_TCP_Profile": false,
        "enable_TLS_Client": true,
        "enable_TLS_Server": false,
        "enable_UDP_Profile": false,
        "enable_snat": true,
        "snat_addresses": [],
        "snat_automap": true,
        "enable_WAF": false,
        "enable_iRules": false,
        "virtualPort": 443,
        "pool": "pool_{{app_name}}",
        "virtualName": "vs_{{app_name}}",
		"virtualType": "standard",
        "multiCertificatesEnum": [
          {
			"advanced_configuration": false,
			"authentication_depth": 9,
			"authentication_frequency": "one-time",
			"ciphers": "DEFAULT",
			"clientTlsName": "clienttls-cert",
			"dh_groups": "DEFAULT",
			"ecdsaCertificate": "",
			"enable_authentication": true,
			"rsaCertificate": "self_demo.f5.com",
			"signature_algorithms": "DEFAULT",
			"sniDefault": true,
			"sniServers": [],
			"tls_c_1_1": false,
			"tls_c_1_2": true,
			"tls_c_1_3": false,
			"trustCACertificate": "CA-DEMO",
			"useMultiCerts": false
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

														"matchingValue": "user1",

									"itemType": "allow",
									"name": "Allow"
								}
							]

					}
				},
				"policyType": "PerSession",
				"profileType": "all",
				"restrictToSingleClientIP": false,
				"samesiteCookie": false,
				"samesiteCookieAttrValue": "strict",
				"scope": "profile",
				"secureCookie": false,
				"timeout": 300,
				"useHttp503OnError": false,
				"userIdentityMethod": "http"
			},
			"connectivityProfileConfiguration": {
				"clientPolicy": {
					"androidEcRequireDeviceAuth": false,
					"androidEcSavePasswordMethod": "disk",
					"androidEcSavePasswordTimeout": 240,
					"chromeosEcLogonMethod": "native",
					"chromeosEcSavePasswordMethod": "disk",
					"chromeosEcSavePasswordTimeout": 240,
					"ecComponentUpdate": "yes",
					"ecLocationDnsList": [],
					"ecReuseWinlogonCreds": false,
					"ecReuseWinlogonSession": false,
					"ecRunLogoffScript": false,
					"ecSavePasswordMethod": "none",
					"ecSavePasswordTimeout": 240,
					"ecSaveServersOnExit": true,
					"ecWarnBeforeScriptLaunch": true,
					"iosEcRequireDeviceAuth": false,
					"iosEcSavePasswordMethod": "disk",
					"iosEcSavePasswordTimeout": 240,
					"macosEcLogonMethod": "native",
					"macosEcSavePasswordMethod": "disk",
					"macosEcSavePasswordTimeout": 240,
					"serverList": []
				},
				"compressBufferSize": 4096,
				"compressCpusaver": true,
				"compressCpusaverHigh": 90,
				"compressCpusaverLow": 75,
				"compressGzipLevel": 6,
				"compressGzipMemlevel": 8192,
				"compressGzipWindowsize": 16384,
				"compressionAdaptive": true,
				"compressionCodecs": [],
				"compressionDeflateLevel": 1,
				"pppTunnel": {
					"profilePpp": {}
				}
			},
			"loggingConfiguration": [
				{
					"component": "apmd",
					"level": "NOTICE"
				},
				{
					"component": "tmm",
					"level": "NOTICE"
				},
				{
					"component": "websso",
					"level": "NOTICE"
				},
				{
					"component": "renderer",
					"level": "NOTICE"
				}
			]
		}
	]
}

{
  "name": "{{app_name}}",
  "set_name": "Examples",
  "template_name": "http",
  "description": "{{app_name}}-description",
  "parameters": {
    "application_name": "{{app_name}}",
    "application_description": "{{app_name}}-description",
    "enable_Global_Resiliency": false,
    "monitors": [
      {
        "interval": 5,
        "isDefault": true,
        "isHttpMonitor": true,
        "monitorName": "http",
        "monitorType": "http",
        "receiveString": ".*",
        "sendString": "GET / HTTP/1.0\\r\\n\\r\\n",
        "timeout": 16
      }
    ],
    "pools": [
      {
        "loadBalancingMode": "round-robin",
        "loadBalancingRatio": 10,
        "monitorType": [
          "http"
        ],
        "servicePort": 80,
        "application_name": "{{app_name}}",
        "poolName": "pool_{{app_name}}"
      }
    ],
    "virtuals": [
      {
        "FastL4_idleTimeout": 600,
        "FastL4_looseClose": true,
        "FastL4_looseInitialization": true,
        "FastL4_resetOnTimeout": true,
        "FastL4_tcpCloseTimeout": 43200,
        "FastL4_tcpHandshakeTimeout": 43200,
        "TCP_idle_timeout": 60,
        "UDP_idle_timeout": 60,
		"is_virtual_type_standard": true,
		"auto_last_hop": "auto",
		"enable_Access": true,
		"accessPolicyEnum": "{{psp_policy_name}}",
        "accessAdditionalConfigurations": " ",
        "enable_FastL4": false,
        "enable_HTTP2_Profile": false,
        "enable_TCP_Profile": false,
        "enable_TLS_Client": true,
        "enable_TLS_Server": false,
        "enable_UDP_Profile": false,
        "enable_snat": true,
        "snat_addresses": [],
        "snat_automap": true,
        "enable_WAF": false,
        "enable_iRules": false,
        "virtualPort": 443,
        "pool": "pool_{{app_name}}",
        "virtualName": "vs_{{app_name}}",
		"virtualType": "standard",
        "multiCertificatesEnum": [
          {
			"advanced_configuration": false,
			"authentication_depth": 9,
			"authentication_frequency": "one-time",
			"ciphers": "DEFAULT",
			"clientTlsName": "clienttls-cert",
			"dh_groups": "DEFAULT",
			"ecdsaCertificate": "",
			"enable_authentication": false,
			"rsaCertificate": "self_demo.f5.com",
			"signature_algorithms": "DEFAULT",
			"sniDefault": true,
			"sniServers": [],
			"tls_c_1_1": false,
			"tls_c_1_2": true,
			"tls_c_1_3": false,
			"trustCACertificate": "",
			"useMultiCerts": false
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

  "set_name": "Examples",
  "template_name": "http",
  "description": "{{app_name}}-description",
  "parameters": {
    "application_name": "{{app_name}}",

        "monitorName": "http",
        "monitorType": "http",
        "receiveString": ".*",
        "sendString": "GET / HTTP/1.0\\r\\n\\r\\n",
        "timeout": 16
      }
    ],
    "pools": [
      {
        "loadBalancingMode": "round-robin",
        "loadBalancingRatio": 10,
        "monitorType": [
          "http"
        ],
        "servicePort": 80,
        "application_name": "{{app_name}}",

      }
    ],
    "virtuals": [
      {
        "FastL4_idleTimeout": 600,
        "FastL4_looseClose": true,
        "FastL4_looseInitialization": true,
        "FastL4_resetOnTimeout": true,
        "FastL4_tcpCloseTimeout": 43200,

        "UDP_idle_timeout": 60,
